title: How to write a thank you letter and appreciation - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Aunt Laura, Thank you so much for this beautiful clock that you gave me for my birthday. I absolutely love it. I placed it right above my fireplace on the mantel where I can enjoy it everyday. Each time I see it I think of you. I look forward to our next visit. Send my love to my cousins. I love you dearly. Sincerely, Sarah
